economy.teethdesc: You can use teeth to buy items or upgrades for me! Get teeth with daily commands, from crates, or by voting for me on {0} using {1}vote

err.noperm: You are not allowed to perform that command... Required permission: `{0}`
err.botnoperm: I am not allowed to perform that command ;-; Required permission: `{0}`
err.usage: Incorrect usage! Run {0}help {1} for more information.

helptxt.desc: Need help? Here is a list of all the things I can do. For more details on a specific command or category, type {1}help <name>

hug.err: I could not find that user, but I'll give you a hug instead <3

kiss.err: Sorry {0}, I could not find that user in the server, s-so... umm, i'll give you one...

blush.err: Sorry {0}, I could not find that person in the server, but I'm sure they're blushworthy <3

cuddle.err: Sorry {0}, I could not find that person in the server, but I'll give you some cuddles :>

slap.err: Sorry {0}, I could not find that person in the server, but you c-can hit me if you want...

brief.autodelete: Automatically deletes non-image messages in a given channel.
brief.help: Displays a list of all commands, and how to use them.
brief.embed: I can embed messages for you and make them fancy!
brief.hug: Give a hug to somebody who needs it <3
brief.blush: Something made you blush? Show it with a gif.
brief.slap: Mad at somebody? Go ahead, release your anger.

help.autodelete:
Set me to automatically delete all non-image messages in a given channel. This includes all captioned images and image links as well. Useful for maintaining pure image galleries, no bullshit.
Usage: `{0}autodelete <command> <channel_id>`
Parameters: `start` `stop`
Example: {0}autodelete start 693748784034625012
help.clear:
Automatically delete a given amount of messages in the channel. Limit: 999 messages
Usage: {0}clear <messages>
Example: {0}clear 15
help.help: {0}help will display a list of all commands. {0}help <category> will display a list of all commands in a category, and {0}help <command> will display detailed information and usage about a specific command.
help.say:
I can pass on a message for you, if you want. If possible, I will delete your command after sending. Example:
`{0}say haha you're so funny`
help.embed:
Have me embed and format a message. If possible, I will delete your command after sending. You can pass colour and title arguments to the command if you want, with the flags `-c` and `-t`. Titles must be closed in brackets, and colours must be hex values. Example:
`{0}embed -c #000000 -t [announcement] actually nvm have a nice day guys`
help.hug:
Makes me send a hug gif to the chat with a caption. Mentioning someone will change the caption.
Usage: {0}hug @someone
help.kiss:
Makes me send a kiss gif to the chat with a caption. Mentioning someone will change the caption.
Usage: {0}kiss @someone
help.cuddle:
Makes me send a cuddle gif to the chat with a caption. Mentioning someone will change the caption.
Usage: {0}cuddle @someone
help.blush:
Makes me send a blush gif to the chat with a caption. Mentioning someone will change the caption.
Usage: {0}blush @someone
help.slap:
Makes me send a slap gif to the chat with a caption. Mentioning someone will change the caption.
Usage: {0}slap @someone
